products.name: SMARTHEART GOLD FOOD FOR PUPPIES AND PREGNANT DOGS
products.description: This is a premium dog food line specifically designed for puppies (under 12 months old) and pregnant dogs. It is made from high-quality ingredients that meet Japanese standards. The product provides rich nutrients to support overall puppy development and maintain the health of pregnant dogs.

products.name: DOG FOOD FOR ADULT SMALL BREEDS - LAMB & RICE FLAVOR
products.description: This is a premium dog food line specially formulated for adult dogs (12 months and older) of small breeds (up to 10kg). It is made with high-quality lamb from New Zealand and rice imported from Thailand, offering a delicious taste, balanced nutrition, and reduced risk of allergies.

products.name: LUVCARE FOOD FOR SMALL BREED PUPPIES
products.description: This kibble line improves coat and skin within 3 weeks of use, designed for small breed puppies (under 12 months, under 10kg), as well as pregnant and nursing dogs. It features small, easy-to-chew kibble that supports coat care, gut health, and immunity in small breed dogs.

products.name: LUVCARE FOOD FOR MEDIUM BREED PUPPIES
products.description: This kibble line improves coat and skin within 3 weeks, designed for medium breed puppies (under 12 months, 10–25kg). It provides essential nutrients such as Triple Omega, Calcium, Phosphorus, and antioxidants to nourish the skin and support overall health.

products.name: LUVCARE FOOD FOR MEDIUM BREED ADULT DOGS
products.description: This kibble line improves coat and skin within 3 weeks, designed for adult dogs (12 months and older) of medium breeds (10–25kg). It offers essential nutrients like Triple Omega, Calcium, Phosphorus, and antioxidants for healthy skin and comprehensive health.

products.name: SMARTHEART POWER PACK FOOD FOR PUPPIES
products.description: This dog food is specially designed for puppies (under 12 months) who are active and require strong muscle development. It is enriched with high-quality protein for healthy muscle growth.

products.name: SMARTHEART POWER PACK FOOD FOR SMALL BREED ADULT DOGS
products.description: This dog food is specially designed for small breed adult dogs (12 months and older, under 10kg) who are active and require strong muscles. It provides high-quality protein and essential nutrients to sustain energy throughout the day.

products.name: DOG FOOD FOR PREGNANT, NURSING DOGS AND YOUNG PUPPIES
products.description: This kibble is designed for pregnant and nursing dogs, as well as puppies under 3 months. It provides complete and balanced nutrition that meets AAFCO standards, supporting healthy growth for puppies and a safe pregnancy for mothers.

products.name: SMARTHEART KIBBLE FOR SMALL BREED PUPPIES (MILK FLAVOR)
products.description: This kibble is designed for small breed puppies (3–12 months, under 10kg) with milk flavor. It meets AAFCO nutritional standards, rich in DHA, Omega 3, and Choline for brain and heart health. It also contains GOS, similar to mother’s milk, supporting digestion.

products.name: DOG FOOD FOR ADULT DOGS – CHICKEN & LIVER FLAVOR
products.description: This kibble is designed for small breed adult dogs (over 12 months, under 10kg) with a new flavor: chicken and liver. It provides complete and balanced nutrition according to AAFCO standards and includes essential nutrients for overall health protection.
